metadata.synopsis: Jaheira's Doppelganger hangs around after her deal with Roah. If she spots the player then she will fire off a quip before attacking
metadata.how_to_trigger: Speak to Jaheira's Doppelganger after allowing her and Roah to conclude their deal

0.speaker: GROUP_Act3_LOW_JaheiraClone_JaheiraVoice
0.text: Stone Lord - we have some uninvited guests. See them out.
0.context: NodeContext: Calling on her minion to kill us after we interrupted a business meeting.
